item.title: Japanese Financial Regulator Proposes to Include Cryptocurrency in Securities Regulations
item.description: On September 4th, as per Cointelegraph, on Tuesday, the Financial Services Agency (FSA) of Japan issued a report suggesting that the regulation of cryptocurrencies should be transferred from the "Payment Services Act" to the more rigorous "Financial Instruments and Exchange Act" (FIEA) framework. This action is intended to enhance investor protection, address issues such as unclear information disclosure, unregistered operations, and security vulnerabilities within the industry, and bring cryptocurrency regulation in line with securities regulation.The report shows that in Japan, there are already over 12 million cryptocurrency accounts, with total user deposits reaching 5 trillion yen (approximately 33.7 billion US dollars). If the new regulations come into effect, cryptocurrency issuers will be subject to stricter disclosure requirements, and intermediary services will also be under more intense oversight. The proposal is currently in the form of an internal briefing document await

item.title: Tom Lee: Fed Could Cut Rates in September, Stock Market Expected to Rally
item.description: On September 4th, Tom Lee, the Chairman of BitMine's Board of Directors, stated in a Macro Minute video that although the market is widely concerned that September will witness a decline due to seasonal factors and the risk of a potential increase in VIX, he thinks the most appropriate approach is for the Federal Reserve to maintain its stance of inaction this year and start cutting rates in September. This will be beneficial to the stock market.The Federal Reserve has maintained a pause on rate hikes for the most part of this year. It is anticipated that the Federal Reserve will begin cutting rates in September, similar to what occurred in 1998 and 2024. In both these historical contexts, the market subsequently experienced a significant rebound, especially in the performance approaching the end of the year. Hence, Tom Lee has offered a "contrarian" assessment that goes against the general sentiment of the market: September 2025 may bring about a bullish market.

item.title: Binance Alpha's Gata (GATA) Airdrop Single Ticket Revenue is approximately $25
item.description: On September 4th, according to market intelligence, Binance Alpha has listed Gata (GATA), and the current market value of GATA is $8 million. Each eligible user can obtain an airdrop of 500 GATA tokens. The estimated value of this airdrop based on current prices is approximately $25.

item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: Jack Ma's affiliated company Yunfeng Financial acquires Ethereum, stock price surges 6% today
item.description: September 4th: In the past, an affiliate of Alibaba, Yunfeng Financial, purchased 10,000 ETH at an average price of $4,400. Today, Yunfeng Financial's Hong Kong stock [Stock Code: 00376] surged by more than 6%, which has attracted widespread attention in the market. Industry insiders stated that with the cryptocurrency market rebounding and institutional investors continuously entering, Yunfeng Financial's large position in ETH has a significant impact on market sentiment and price trends.It is worth noting that Yunfeng Financial not only focuses on the spot market but also actively makes arrangements in digital asset derivatives and blockchain payment applications, shaping a long-term strategy in the digital finance field. Investors can gain insights into institutional operations in the crypto market and risk management strategies, which can provide references for their investment decisions.BiyaPay, a multi-asset trading wallet, will continue to provide you with one-stop services

item.title: Union Announces Mainnet Launch, Opens Airdrop Registration
item.description: On September 4th, the interoperability protocol Union declared the launch of the mainnet. The U Drop airdrop is now available for claiming and will remain open until September 18th.

item.title: Pre-market Crypto Stocks in US Stock Market Experience Downtrend, WLFI Treasury Company's ALT5 Sigma Plunges by 12.47%
item.description: On September 4th, based on market data, the pre-market trading of cryptocurrency stocks in the US was generally in a downtrend. This includes:American Bitcoin (ABTC), a mining company supported by the Trump family. It surged by 16.52% on its first day of listing yesterday, but is currently down by 8.6% in pre-market trading.WLFI Treasury's ALT5 Sigma (ALTS) saw a sharp drop of 12.47%.Coinbase (COIN) is up by 0.02%.Circle (CRCL) is up by 0.8%.MicroStrategy (MSTR) is up by 0.1%.Bullish (BLSH) is down by 1.3%.Bitmine (BMNR) is down by 0.96%.BTCS (BTCS) is down by 1.3%.SharpLink Gaming (SBET) is down by 2.2%.BNB Network Company (BNC) is down by 1.3%.

item.title: Binance has announced that the Gata (GATA) airdrop distribution is now complete, with trading to commence shortly.
item.description: September 4th. According to official channels, Binance has declared that the Gata (GATA) airdrop has been completed and the token's display and trading will commence shortly.Previously in the news, Binance Alpha is set to list Gata (GATA), with Alpha trading scheduled to begin on September 4, 2025, at 18:00 (UTC+8). After the start of trading, users who hold at least 220 Binance Alpha points can claim 500 GATA tokens through an airdrop. The first come, first served principle applies.

item.title: American Bitcoin is expanding its Bitcoin mining operation from 10 EH/s to 24 EH/s.
item.description: September 4th. As per market information, American Bitcoin (stock code ABTC), a mining company with the support of the Trump family, is going to expand its Bitcoin mining operation from 10 EH/s to 24 EH/s, representing a 2.4-fold increase.

item.title: Ethereum's Net Staking Inflow Surpasses Net Withdrawal Outflow, Reaching a New High Since September 2023
item.description: September 4th. Based on the data from the Validator Queue Tracker website, the staking entry queue of the Ethereum PoS network exceeded the exit queue today. The current entry queue is 833,000 ETH, with an approximate value of $36.6 billion, while the current exit queue is 823,000 ETH, with an approximate value of $36.2 billion.It is worth noting that there has been a substantial increase in the staking demand from new validators on the Ethereum PoS network, reaching the highest level since September 2nd, 2023, at 860,000 ETH.BlockBeats Note: The line chart data is accurate as of yesterday.

item.title: Justin Sun: No Reason to Doubt High-Yield Staking, Interest Subsidized by Corporate Profits
item.description: On September 4th, Justin Sun responded to the inquiries regarding the "Huobi HTX High-Yield Financial Product" as follows:Similar to the popular instant rewards (free lunch) in the current industry, the high-yield interest rate is 100% subsidized by the group. This is essentially done to compete for users among trading platforms. The subsidy logic is also very straightforward: user growth leads to trading volume growth, which is worthwhile in the long run.Huobi HTX is still in the early stage of growth and will consider other factors after increasing asset immersion.The Merkel Tree proof has been released for nearly 34 months, ensuring fund transparency.The current group has an annual profit of tens of billions of US dollars. Therefore, no one should question our ability to subsidize, right?Finally, Justin Sun stated that there is no reason to question the Huobi HTX demand deposit financial product as funds can be withdrawn directly.
